title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting 'new Date()' as content for three items and saving and previewing, the dynamic text item displays a different format compared to the data and text item.
EB: The dynamic text item should display the same datetime format as the data and text item.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for the three items.
2. Save and preview the page.
3. Observe the datetime format in the dynamic text item and compare it to the format in the data and text item.
